alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CENTRE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bellefonte, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Lamar, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, Blanchard, McElhattan, Monument, Bald Eagle State Park, Mackeyville, Howard, Beech Creek and Lock Haven University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
